mindmap
    root((Central))
        Square[I am a square]
        Rounded(I am rounded)
        Circle((I am a circle))
        Bang))I am a bang((
        Cloud)I am a cloud(
        Hexagon{{I am a hexagon}}
---
((Central)) -+- [I am a square]
             +- (I am rounded)
             +- ((I am a circle))
             +- ))I am a bang((
             +- )I am a cloud(
             +- {{I am a hexagon}}
